BasicInfo.short: A robust platform developed for enterprise-level accounting teams that automates accrual estimation processes and vendor management.

Products.name: Accrualify PO Management
Products.description: Purchase requisition issuance, PO issuance, Internal approval workflow, Vendor approval

Products.name: Accrualify Vendor Pro
Products.description: see all invoices, accruals, POs associated to a customer, proactive estimates, matching of estimates to Invoices, invoice creation

Products.name: Accrualify Payments
Products.description: Send and receive ACH payments through the Accrualify Purchaser Platform.

Products.name: Accrualify Purchaser
Products.description: Automate accrual processes, manage and message vendors, integrate with NetSuite

CurrentTeam.title: Head of Marketing, Branding, and Design
